message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, and you can have 10. We'll see how this goes!
Your offer was a bit harsh, Alice. Let's be more realistic. How about this split?
Okay, I'll compromise. I'll take 60 this time, and you get 40.  Let's see if we can work this out.
The value of the money is decreasing with each round, Alice. This is my final offer.
